name: Crowd Of People
description:
Crowd of People is currently a prototpe for a Simlation Game You as a Player will have the opportunity to go through a crowd of people while they are walking around.  If you bump into people different things will happen and different reactions will follow. Just play around with the reactions you get and find new combinations of bumping into people.  It is still in development,  so follow the Dev.Log please :D Created by: Mehtap Kurucay
Prototype Start : 12.10.2018 Prototype Version 0.1 End : 15.10.2018 This game was created at the GameDesign//UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai
"Game Gardening Simulator"  (WinterSemester 2018/19)
